step1.title: Hey! Welcome!
step1.description:
Welcome to the new version of the forum-associatif-numerique.fr website,
i'll guide you through the process of creating a page for your club!

step2.title: What's new?
step2.description:
We've made some changes to the way you create a page and added multi-language support.
Let's see how it works!

step3.title: Language selector
step3.description:
Here you can select the language you want to create the page in.
For now we'll start with the default language, and translate the page later.

step4.title: Edit the club name
step4.description: Let's start by editing the club name.

step5.title: DON'T FORGET!
step5.description: Nice! Now don't forget to save your changes!

step6.title: Let's continue!
step6.description: Now we'll do some more advanced stuff: the page content.

step7.title: Add a new section
step7.description:
Here you can add a new section to the page, like a text block, an image gallery, or an embed.
Click on the "+" button and select a text block to add it to the page.

step8.title: Edit the text block
step8.description: Great! Now you can edit the text block you just added.

step9.title: Perfect!
step9.description:
You've added a new section to the page!
Don't forget to save your changes!

step10.title: Back to the language selector
step10.description:
After you've added your content and SAVED it, you can now create a translation for another language.
Let's select a different language and translate the page.

step11.title: Translate the club name
step11.description:
As you can see, the fallback language is already filled in.
You can leave it as is if it's the same, or translate it to another language.

step12.title: Recreate the page
step12.description:
Now you can recreate the page in another language.
Aaaannd... 
Don't forget to save your changes!

step13.title: That's it!
step13.description:
You've successfully created a page for your club!
If you have any questions, feel free to ask the webmaster.

step14.title: One more thing!
step14.description: Oh, and you can always give feedback on the new website by clicking here.

step16.title: Wait a minute!
step16.description: Did you forget to save your changes??
